trans-unit.source: Draws a border, background, or both around another element.
trans-unit.target: Ritar en kantlinje, bakgrund eller båda runt ett annat element.

trans-unit.source: Border can have only one child.
trans-unit.target: Kantlinjen kan ha endast ett underordnat objekt.

trans-unit.source: To display multiple child elements, you need to place an additional <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element within the parent Border.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill visa flera underordnade element, måste du placera ytterligare <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>element i överordnat kantlinje.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: You can then place child elements within that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan placera underordnade element i som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>element.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: If you want to display a border around your content, you must place the elements within a parent Border element.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill visa en kant runt ditt innehåll måste du placera element i ett överordnat element för kantlinjen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the contents of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Ordnar innehållet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref> element.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> can have only one child element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>kan ha endast ett underordnat element.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> this element uses to arrange its child element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> det här elementet som används för att ordna dess underordnade element.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the arranged size of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref> element and its child element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> som representerar ordnade storleken på det här <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref> och dess underordnade element.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that fills the area between the bounds of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> som fyller området mellan gränserna för en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that draws the background.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> som ritar bakgrunden.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen har inget standardvärde.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that draws the outer border color.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> som ritar yttre Kantlinjefärg.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that draws the outer border color.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> som ritar yttre Kantlinjefärg.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen har inget standardvärde.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger relativt <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> that describes the width of the boundaries of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> som beskriver bredden på ramen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen har inget standardvärde.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which the corners of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref> are rounded.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som representerar i vilken grad som hörn en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref> avrundas.

trans-unit.source: Although the property name suggests that you can use only singular values, CornerRadius also supports non-uniform radii.
trans-unit.target: Även om egenskapsnamnet som du kan använda endast enda värden föreslås stöd CornerRadius också för icke-enhetlig radie.

trans-unit.source: Radius values that are too large are scaled so that they blend smoothly from corner to corner.
trans-unit.target: RADIUS-värden som är för stor skalas så att de blandas smidigt från hörn till hörn.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.CornerRadius"></xref> that describes the degree to which corners are rounded.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.CornerRadius"> </xref> som beskrivs i vilken grad som hörn avrundas.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen har inget standardvärde.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.CornerRadius*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.CornerRadius*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.CornerRadius*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref> before they are arranged during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: Mäter de underordnade element för en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref> innan de ordnas under <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.ArrangeOverride*>förutsättningsreglerna</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> element determines its upper <xref:System.Windows.Size> limit by analyzing the sizing properties, margin, and requested size of its child elements.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>elementet anger dess övre <xref:System.Windows.Size>gränsen genom att analysera sizing egenskaper, marginal och begärda storleken på dess underordnade element.</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>

trans-unit.source: An upper <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> limit that cannot be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: Ett övre <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> gräns som inte får överskridas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the upper size limit of the element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> som representerar den övre gränsen för elementet.

trans-unit.source: Draws the contents of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object during the render pass of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ritar innehållet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objekt under render förbikoppling av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> that defines the object to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> som definierar objekt som ska ritas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value that describes the amount of space between a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref> and its child element.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger en <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> värde som anger hur mycket utrymme mellan en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref> och dess underordnade element.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> that describes the amount of space between a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref> and its single child element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> som beskriver avståndet mellan en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref> och dess enda underordnade element.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen har inget standardvärde.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Padding*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Padding*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
